missionProperties.repositionOverride: Block access to the structural supports.

events.eventText:
You rummage through the supplies and take whatever seems useful.

Draw a supply card. You gain 1 medpac. Claim this token.

You rummage through the supplies and take whatever seems useful.

Draw a supply card. You gain 1 medpac. Claim this token.

You rummage through the supplies and take whatever seems useful.

Draw a supply card. You gain 1 medpac. Claim this token.

You rummage through the supplies and take whatever seems useful.

Draw a supply card. You gain 1 medpac. Claim this token.

The criminals have a small base in the swamps from which they launch raids on Hutt lands. Jabba considers this a personal insult and hand-picked a pilot to deliver his retort.

While you wonder how the Hutt acquired structural blueprints of the compound, you know better than to ask. Weak points are circled on the diagrams, with the simple instruction, “Destroy.”

The straightforward nature of the assignment agrees with Jabba's pilot. She gleefully dives her HWK-290 straight into the compound, firing.

eventActions.tbText:
The pilot demolishes two defense stations and clears a smoldering landing zone before opening the hatch. “Have fun!”

{-} Deploy the heroes to the blue highlighted space.
In the distance, you can see some of the weak points marked on the map. The ground is swampy, and everything is covered in thick fog. It's impossible to make out anything beyond the swamp.

translatedEntityProperties.theText:
The swamp is filled with a hazy fog. It's impossible to see what awaits you here.

{-} The first time a Rebel figure enters the swamp, click "Enter Swamp".

The swamp is filled with a hazy fog. It's impossible to see what awaits you here.

{-} The first time a Rebel figure enters the swamp, click "Enter Swamp".

The criminals' outlook is built into a tree near the swamp.

{-} A Rebel figure can attack a structural support (Health: 6, Defense: 2 {G}).

A stone wall appears to be part of the back wall of the criminals' stronghold.

{-} A Rebel figure can attack a structural support (Health: 6, Defense: 2 {G}).

eventActions.tbText:
{-} Neutral mission tokens represent structural supports. A Rebel figure can attack a structural support (Health: 6, Defense: 2 {G}).
{-} The first time a Rebel figure enters the swamp, click the green highlight and select "Enter Swamp".
{-} The Rebels win when all structural supports have been destroyed.
{-} The Rebels lose when all heroes are wounded.
You only have a moment to get your bearings before a squad of mercenaries rushes to confront you.

eventActions.shortText: Find and destroy the structural supports (&Supports destroyed&/5).

eventActions.theText:
{-} The door is locked. A Rebel figure can attack the door (Health 4, Defense 1 {G}).
{-} Neutral mission tokens represent structural supports. A Rebel figure can attack a structural support (Health: 6, Defense: 2 {G}).
{-} The first time a Rebel figure enters the swamp, click the green highlight and select "Enter Swamp".
{-} The Rebels win when all structural supports have been destroyed.
{-} The Rebels lose when all heroes are wounded.

events.eventText:
By the time you've finally finished, splinters and rubble are all that remain of Jabba's foes. You return to the shuttle, where the pilot compliments your work. The Hutt lord laughs heartily as you tell him the news, and his court erupts into applause.

{-} The Rebels win the mission!
{-} Each hero receives 1 XP. Heroes receive 200 credits per hero.

eventActions.tbText:
The next morning, you are summoned to Jabba's court, where he speaks to you through an interpreter droid: “The Mighty Jabba is pleased with your loyalty. He is aware of the purpose of your mission and is willing to help, if you will do one more job for him. The meddlesome Empire has established an orbital defense and logistics base near the Pit of Carkoon. Jabba commands you to steal the security codes from this base, which will allow him to regain mastery of Tatooine. Do this, and Jabba will deliver your civilians to a safe haven."

{-} Discard all remaining active Story Mission cards. Place Story Mission card "Moment of Fate" into play.

events.eventText:
Whoever these rivals are, they've spared no credits on their defenses. You've dealt a blow to their infrastructure, but in the end, you're the ones who must retreat. Jabba is dissatisfied with your failure. His court falls deathly silent as the Hutt lord contemplates your future. Bib Fortuna translates his master’s warning, “You have one last chance."

{-} The Rebels lose the mission.
{-} Each hero receives 1 XP. Heroes receive 100 credits per hero.

eventActions.tbText:
The next morning, you are summoned to Jabba's court, where he speaks to you through an interpreter droid: “The Mighty Jabba is pleased with your loyalty. He is aware of the purpose of your mission and is willing to help, if you will do one more job for him. The meddlesome Empire has established an orbital defense and logistics base near the Pit of Carkoon. Jabba commands you to steal the security codes from this base, which will allow him to regain mastery of Tatooine. Do this, and Jabba will deliver your civilians to a safe haven."

{-} Discard all remaining active Story Mission cards. Place Story Mission card "Moment of Fate" into play.

events.eventText: Climbing through the charred remains of the security door, you push forward into the criminals' last stronghold.

translatedEntityProperties.theText:
A sturdy security door leads into the criminal's stronghold.

{-} The door is locked. A Rebel figure can attack the door (Health 4, Defense 1 {G}).

eventActions.tbText: Before you stands a familiar face in the criminal underworld. On another day, you may have cursed the bounty hunter’s presence, but working for Jabba, you've begun to understand mercenary life. There are no hard feelings. Business is business.

events.eventText:
You blow up the outlook, and only splinters remains.

{-} Roll 1 green die. Each figure within 4 spaces of the destroyed structural support suffers {H} equal to the {H} results.

You blow up the stone wall which collapses into a pile of rocks and rubble.

{-} Roll 1 green die. Each figure within 4 spaces of the destroyed structural support suffers {H} equal to the {H} results.

translatedEntityProperties.theText:
A stone wall appears to be part of the back wall of the criminals' stronghold.

{-} A Rebel figure can attack a structural support (Health: 6, Defense: 2 {G}).

events.eventText:
You blow up the column, and the wall collapses on the outpost.

{-} Roll 1 green die. Each figure within 4 spaces of the destroyed structural support suffers {H} equal to the {H} results.

translatedEntityProperties.theText:
There are cracks in the wall holding up the roof of the small outpost.

{-} A Rebel figure can attack a structural support (Health: 6, Defense: 2 {G}).

events.eventText:
You reduce the wall to a pile of rubble.

{-} Roll 1 green die. Each figure within 4 spaces of the destroyed structural support suffers {H} equal to the {H} results.

translatedEntityProperties.theText:
The load-bearing wall of the stronghold's side room looks weak.

{-} A Rebel figure can attack a structural support (Health: 6, Defense: 2 {G}).

events.eventText:
As you pelt the colum with attacks, it trembles, then finally collapses, bringing part of the roof with it.

{-} Roll 1 green die. Each figure within 4 spaces of the destroyed structural support suffers {H} equal to the {H} results.

translatedEntityProperties.theText:
An large column holds up the roof of the stronghold.

{-} A Rebel figure can attack a structural support (Health: 6, Defense: 2 {G}).

events.eventText: You slowly advance into the fog.

translatedEntityProperties.theText:
The swamp is filled with a hazy fog. It's impossible to see what awaits you here.

{-} The first time a Rebel figure enters the swamp, click "Enter Swamp".

The swamp is filled with a hazy fog. It's impossible to see what awaits you here.

{-} The first time a Rebel figure enters the swamp, click "Enter Swamp".

eventActions.tbText: A chain wrapped around a thick root rattles. As you approach the clearing, the clanking intensifies, and a collared beast stands from a fresh meal.

The rancor charges at you, its jagged teeth glistening with saliva. As it rears to swipe, the chain chokes tight, pulling the giant to the ground. The only way is forward, but you keep a watchful eye on the leash.

{-} The <color="red">Rancor</color> cannot leave the swamp (tile JABBA 01A).

events.eventText:
As you advance, your enemies fall back to regroup.

{-} All Imperial figures move 2 to block access to the closest structural support.

eventActions.tbText: More criminals emerge from the fog covering the swamp.

eventActions.theText:
{-} The door is locked. A Rebel figure can attack the door (Health 4, Defense 1 {G}).
{-} Neutral mission tokens represent structural supports. A Rebel figure can attack a structural support (Health: 6, Defense: 2 {G}).
{-} The <color="red">Rancor</color> cannot leave the swamp (tile JABBA 01A).
{-} The Rebels win when all structural supports have been destroyed.
{-} The Rebels lose when all heroes are wounded.

{-} The Rebels lose when all heroes are wounded.

events.eventText:
The rancor roars with fury, grabs the chain with both claws, and pulls with all its might. The tree trembles, then breaks as the rancor rips the chain right through it.

{-} The <color="red">Rancor</color> can now leave the swamp.
The threat level of the next mission (and only the next mission) increases by 1. During the Rebel Upgrade stage, the Rebel players can decide to spend 50 credits per hero to prevent this.
Because 4 structural supports were destroyed, the heroes receive 25 credits per hero.
